a.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
a.usage: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

b.name: LumaShield Serum B
b.usage: Apply 2 drops in the evening on clean, dry skin.

key_differences.concentration: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum: 10% Vitamin C vs LumaShield Serum B: 12% Vitamin C
key_differences.benefits: Brightening; Fades dark spots vs Brightening; Evens tone
